message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:1 ratio. This might seem a bit lopsided, but consider the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60:40 is a fairer ratio considering the decreasing value of money.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness while accounting for the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
